original_text: God punishes wicked people. When righteous people see that happen, they are happy. Good people then laugh at wicked people. God punishes wicked people. When righteous people see that happen, they are happy. Good people then laugh at wicked people. God punishes wicked people. When righteous people see that happen, they are happy. Good people then laugh at wicked people. God punishes wicked people.

sentences.korean_translation: 의로운 사람들이 그것이 일어나는 것을 볼 때,
